TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlDocument extends System.Xml.XmlNode

summary.span: Represents an XML document.

span.span: Represents an XML document.

summary.span: You can use this class to load, validate, edit, add, and position XML in a document.

span.span: You can use this class to load, validate, edit, add, and position XML in a document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个 XML 文档的内存中表示形式。The class is an in-memory representation of an XML document. 它实现了 W3C [XML 文档对象模型 (DOM)](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xml-document-object-model-dom.md)级别 1 核心和核心 DOM 级别 2。It implements the W3C [XML Document Object Model (DOM)](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xml-document-object-model-dom.md) Level 1 Core and the Core DOM Level 2. *DOM*代表*文档对象模型*。*DOM* stands for *document object model*. 若要详细了解它，请参阅[XML 文档对象模型 (DOM)](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xml-document-object-model-dom.md)。To read more about it, see [XML Document Object Model (DOM)](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xml-document-object-model-dom.md). 可以通过使用到 DOM 加载 XML类，然后以编程方式读取、 修改和删除 XML 文档中。You can load XML into the DOM by using the class, and then programmatically read, modify, and remove XML in the document. 如果你想要机箱打开类，请参阅如何实现，请参阅[引用源](https://referencesource.microsoft.com/#System.Xml/Xml/System/Xml/Dom/XmlDocument.cs#f82a4c1bd1f0ee12)。If you want to pry open the class and see how it's implemented, see the [Reference Source](https://referencesource.microsoft.com/#System.Xml/Xml/System/Xml/Dom/XmlDocument.cs#f82a4c1bd1f0ee12). ## 任务Tasks - [将 XML 加载到文档对象模型Load XML into the document object model](#Load) - [根据架构验证Validate it against a schema](#Validation) - [在文档树中导航Navigate the document tree](#Navigate) - [查找节点Find nodes](#Find) - [编辑节点Edit nodes](#Edit) - [添加节点Add nodes](#Add) - [删除节点Remove nodes](#Remove) - [位置节点Position nodes](#Position) ## 将 XML 加载到文档对象模型Load XML into the document object model 开始在集合中具有几个丛书此类似的 XML 文档。Start with an XML document like this one that has a few books in a collection. 它包含将包括命名空间、 元素表示数据，以及描述数据属性的任何 XML 文档中找到的基本内容。It contains the basic things that you'd find in any XML document, including a namespace, elements that represent data, and attributes that describe the data. ```xml Pride And Prejudice 24.95 The Handmaid's Tale 29.95 Sense and Sensibility 19.95 ``` 接下来，此数据加载到 DOM，以便可以在内存中使用它。Next, load this data into the DOM so that you can work with it in memory. 若要执行此操作的最常用方法是引用在本地计算机上或在网络上的文件。The most popular way to do this is refer to a file on your local computer or on a network. 此示例从文件加载 XML。This example loads XML from a file. 如果文件不存在，它只是生成一些 XML，并将加载的。If the file doesn't exist, it just generates some XML and loads that. [!code-cpp[XMLProcessingApp#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlprocessingapp/cpp/xmldomprocessing.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XMLProcessingApp#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlprocessingapp/cs/xmlhelpermethods.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XMLProcessingApp#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlprocessingapp/vb/xmlhelpermethods.vb#1)] **完整的示例：**[使用 XmlDocument 类和其他相关的类型操作内存中 XML](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode)**Complete sample:** [Manipulate XML in-Memory by using the XmlDocument class and other related types](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode) **了解更多信息：**[将 XML 文档读入 DOM](~/docs/standard/data/xml/reading-an-xml-document-into-the-dom.md)**Learn more:** [Reading an XML Document into the DOM](~/docs/standard/data/xml/reading-an-xml-document-into-the-dom.md) ## 根据架构验证Validate it against a schema 启动与此类似的 XML 架构。Start with an XML schema like this one. 此架构的 XML 中定义的数据类型和所需的属性。This schema defines the data types in the XML and which attributes are required. ```xml ``` 创建使用您的架构对象，然后将该对象加载到 DOMCreate an object by using your schema, and then load that object into the DOM. 创建的事件处理程序执行时代码尝试修改 XML 文件中与架构的规则冲突的方式。Create an event handler that executes when code attempts to modify your XML file in ways that violate the rules of the schema. 这些代码块显示执行所有这些操作的帮助器方法。These blocks of code show helper methods that do all of this. [!code-cpp[XMLProcessingApp#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlprocessingapp/cpp/xmldomprocessing.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[XMLProcessingApp#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlprocessingapp/cs/xmlhelpermethods.cs#2)] [!code-vb[XMLProcessingApp#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlprocessingapp/vb/xmlhelpermethods.vb#2)] **完整的示例：**[使用 XmlDocument 类和其他相关的类型操作内存中 XML](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode)**Complete sample:** [Manipulate XML in-Memory by using the XmlDocument class and other related types](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode) **了解更多信息：**[在 DOM 中验证 XML 文档](~/docs/standard/data/xml/validating-an-xml-document-in-the-dom.md)**Learn more:** [Validating an XML Document in the DOM](~/docs/standard/data/xml/validating-an-xml-document-in-the-dom.md) ## 在文档树中导航Navigate the document tree 属性可用于在 XML 文档中导航。You can use properties to navigate around an XML document. 但在使用其中任何一个之前，让我们快速回顾一些术语。But before you use any of them, let's quickly review a few terms. 文档组成的节点。Your document is composed of nodes. 每个节点都作为单*父*其正上方的节点。Each node has as single *parent* node directly above it. 没有父节点的唯一节点是文档根元素，因为它是顶级节点。The only node that does not have a parent node is the document root, as it is the top-level node. 大多数节点可以有*子*节点，节点的下一级节点。Most nodes can have *child* nodes, which are nodes directly below them. 在相同级别的节点都*同级*。Nodes that are at the same level are *siblings*. 下面的示例演示了如何获取根节点、 跳转到根节点的第一个子节点、 访问任何子节点、 连接返回到父节点，然后在同级节点之间导航。The following examples show you how to obtain the root node, jump to the first child node of the root node, access any of its child nodes, get back out to the parent node, and then navigate across sibling nodes. **根节点开始****Start with the root node** 此示例中获取的根节点，然后使用该节点要输出到控制台的文档的内容。This example gets the root node and then uses that node to output the contents of the document to the console. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlDocument.DocumentElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDocument.DocumentElement Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlDocument.DocumentElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDocument.DocumentElement Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlDocument.DocumentElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDocument.DocumentElement Example/VB/source.vb#1)] **获取子节点****Get child nodes** 本示例将跳转到根节点的第一个子节点，然后循环该节点的子节点，如果存在任何。This example jumps to the first child node of the root node and then iterates through the child nodes of that node if any exist. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlNode.HasChildNodes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNode.HasChildNodes Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlNode.HasChildNodes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNode.HasChildNodes Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlNode.HasChildNodes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNode.HasChildNodes Example/VB/source.vb#1)] **重新回到这儿的父节点****Get back to the parent node** 使用 属性。Use the property. **引用的最后一个子节点****Refer to the last child node** 此示例向控制台写入一本书的价格。This example writes the price of a book to the console. 价格节点是 book 节点的最后一个子级。The price node is the last child of a book node. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlNode.LastChild Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNode.LastChild Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlNode.LastChild Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNode.LastChild Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlNode.LastChild Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNode.LastChild Example/VB/source.vb#1)] **跨同级向前导航****Navigate forward across siblings** 此示例将向前移动书籍书籍。This example moves forward from book to book. 书节点是与另一个同级。Book nodes are siblings to one another. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlNode.NextSibling Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNode.NextSibling Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlNode.NextSibling Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNode.NextSibling Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlNode.NextSibling Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNode.NextSibling Example/VB/source.vb#1)] **在同级之间向后导航****Navigate backwards across siblings** 以下示例将向后从通讯簿到书籍。This example moves backwards from book to book. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlNode.PreviousSibling Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNode.PreviousSibling Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlNode.PreviousSibling Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNode.PreviousSibling Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlNode.PreviousSibling Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNode.PreviousSibling Example/VB/source.vb#1)] ## 查找节点Find nodes 若要查找的数据的一个或多个节点的最常用方法是使用 XPath 查询字符串，但也不需要其中一个方法。The most popular way to find one or more nodes of data is to use an XPath query string, but there are also methods that don't require one. **获取单个节点****Get a single node** 本示例查找一本书使用的 ISBN 号。This example locates a book by using the ISBN number. [!code-cpp[XMLProcessingApp#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlprocessingapp/cpp/xmldomprocessing.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[XMLProcessingApp#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlprocessingapp/cs/xmlhelpermethods.cs#3)] [!code-vb[XMLProcessingApp#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlprocessingapp/vb/xmlhelpermethods.vb#3)] 在此示例中使用的字符串是一个 Xpath 查询。The string used in this example is an Xpath query. 您可以找到它们此处的更多示例： [XPath 示例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms256086.aspx)。You can find more examples of them here: [XPath examples](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms256086.aspx). 此外可以使用若要检索的节点。You can also use the to retrieve nodes. 若要使用此方法，您将需要定义文档类型定义声明的 XML 文件中事件的 ID。To use this approach, you'll have to define ID's in the document type definition declarations of your XML file. 获取节点后，获取属性或子节点的值。After you get a node, you get the value of attributes or child nodes. 此示例执行该操作与 book 节点。This example does that with a book node. [!code-cpp[XMLProcessingApp#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlprocessingapp/cpp/xmldomprocessing.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[XMLProcessingApp#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlprocessingapp/cs/xmlhelpermethods.cs#4)] [!code-vb[XMLProcessingApp#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlprocessingapp/vb/xmlhelpermethods.vb#4)] **获取节点的集合****Get a collection of nodes** 此示例将选择所有书籍的作者的姓氏**Austen**，然后将更改的那些书籍价格。This example selects all books where the author's last name is **Austen**, and then changes the price of those books. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlNode.SelectNodes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNode.SelectNodes Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlNode.SelectNodes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNode.SelectNodes Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlNode.SelectNodes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlNode.SelectNodes Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 此外可以使用节点的名称的节点集合。You can also get a collection of nodes by using the name of the node. 例如，此示例将获取集合中的所有书名。For example, this example gets a collection of all book titles. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlDocument.GetElementsByTagName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDocument.GetElementsByTagName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlDocument.GetElementsByTagName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDocument.GetElementsByTagName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlDocument.GetElementsByTagName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDocument.GetElementsByTagName Example/VB/source.vb#1)] **完整的示例：**[使用 XmlDocument 类和其他相关的类型操作内存中 XML](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode)**Complete sample:** [Manipulate XML in-Memory by using the XmlDocument class and other related types](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode) **了解更多信息：**[使用 XPath 导航选择节点](~/docs/standard/data/xml/select-nodes-using-xpath-navigation.md)**Learn more:** [Select Nodes Using XPath Navigation](~/docs/standard/data/xml/select-nodes-using-xpath-navigation.md) ## 编辑节点Edit nodes 此示例中编辑 book 节点和其属性。This example edits a book node and its attributes. [!code-cpp[XMLProcessingApp#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlprocessingapp/cpp/xmldomprocessing.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[XMLProcessingApp#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlprocessingapp/cs/xmlhelpermethods.cs#7)] [!code-vb[XMLProcessingApp#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlprocessingapp/vb/xmlhelpermethods.vb#7)] **了解更多信息：**[修改 XML 文档中的节点、内容和值](~/docs/standard/data/xml/modifying-nodes-content-and-values-in-an-xml-document.md)**Learn more:** [Modifying Nodes, Content, and Values in an XML Document](~/docs/standard/data/xml/modifying-nodes-content-and-values-in-an-xml-document.md) **完整的示例：**[使用 XmlDocument 类和其他相关的类型操作内存中 XML](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode)**Complete sample:** [Manipulate XML in-Memory by using the XmlDocument class and other related types](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode) ## 添加节点Add nodes 若要添加节点时，使用方法或方法。To add a node, use the method or the method. 若要添加一个数据节点，如一本书，请使用方法。To add a data node such as a book, use the method. 对于任何其他类型的节点，例如注释、 空白节点或 CDATA 节点，使用方法。For any other type of node such as a comment, whitespace node, or CDATA node, use the method. 此示例创建一个 book 节点、 将属性添加到该节点，然后将该节点添加到文档。This example creates a book node, adds attributes to that node, and then adds that node to the document. [!code-cpp[XMLProcessingApp#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlprocessingapp/cpp/xmldomprocessing.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[XMLProcessingApp#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlprocessingapp/cs/xmlhelpermethods.cs#5)] [!code-vb[XMLProcessingApp#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlprocessingapp/vb/xmlhelpermethods.vb#5)] **完整的示例：**[使用 XmlDocument 类和其他相关的类型操作内存中 XML](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode)**Complete sample:** [Manipulate XML in-Memory by using the XmlDocument class and other related types](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode) **了解更多信息：**[将节点插入 XML 文档中](~/docs/standard/data/xml/inserting-nodes-into-an-xml-document.md)**Learn more:** [Inserting Nodes into an XML Document](~/docs/standard/data/xml/inserting-nodes-into-an-xml-document.md) ## 删除节点Remove nodes 若要删除某个节点，请使用方法。To remove a node, use the method. 此示例从文档和 book 节点之前会显示任何空格删除书籍。This example removes a book from the document and any whitespace that appears just before the book node. [!code-cpp[XMLProcessingApp#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlprocessingapp/cpp/xmldomprocessing.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[XMLProcessingApp#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlprocessingapp/cs/xmlhelpermethods.cs#6)] [!code-vb[XMLProcessingApp#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlprocessingapp/vb/xmlhelpermethods.vb#6)] **完整的示例：**[使用 XmlDocument 类和其他相关的类型操作内存中 XML](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode)**Complete sample:** [Manipulate XML in-Memory by using the XmlDocument class and other related types](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode) **了解更多信息：**[从 XML 删除文档中的节点、内容和值](~/docs/standard/data/xml/removing-nodes-content-and-values-from-an-xml-document.md)**Learn more:** [Removing Nodes, Content, and Values from an XML Document](~/docs/standard/data/xml/removing-nodes-content-and-values-from-an-xml-document.md) ## 位置节点Position nodes 可以选择想要通过使用显示在文档中的节点和方法。You can choose where you want a node to appear in your document by using the and methods. 此示例演示两个帮助器方法。This example shows two helper methods. 其中一个更高版本的节点移动列表中。One of them moves a node higher in a list. 较低的节点移动另一个。The other one moves a node lower. 应用程序，使用户能够在书籍列表中向上和向下移动书籍中，可以使用这些方法。These methods could be used in an application that enables users to move books up and down in a list of books. 当用户选择一本书，按下向上或向下按钮时，你的代码可以调用这些来定位相应的 book 节点之前或之后的其他书籍节点的方法。When a user chooses a book and presses an up or down button, your code could call methods like these to position the corresponding book node before or after other book nodes. [!code-cpp[XMLProcessingApp#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlprocessingapp/cpp/xmldomprocessing.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[XMLProcessingApp#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlprocessingapp/cs/xmlhelpermethods.cs#8)] [!code-vb[XMLProcessingApp#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlprocessingapp/vb/xmlhelpermethods.vb#8)] **完整的示例：**[使用 XmlDocument 类和其他相关的类型操作内存中 XML](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode)**Complete sample:** [Manipulate XML in-Memory by using the XmlDocument class and other related types](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsdesktop/Manipulate-XML-in-memory-4b612d6b/view/SourceCode)

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面是加载时验证的示例。The following is an example of load-time validation. 文档类型定义 (DTD) 验证传递给方法和一个提供通知的任何验证错误的用户。A document type definition (DTD) validating is passed to the method and a is provided to notify users of any validation errors. 在此示例中找到的验证错误，但文档仍处于加载状态。In this example a validation error is found, but the document is still loaded. 或者，可以定义一个验证引发异常，并且通过不指定找到的验证错误时停止加载过程。Alternatively, you can define a validating to throw an exception and stop the load process when a validation error is found by not specifying the . 有关验证 XML 数据的详细信息，请参阅 引用页的“备注”部分。For more information about validating XML data, see the Remarks section of the reference page. [!code-cpp[XmlDocument.cctor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDocument.cctor/CPP/docload.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlDocument.cctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDocument.cctor/CS/docload.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlDocument.cctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDocument.cctor/VB/docload.vb#1)] 示例使用 `bookDTD.xml` 文件作为输入。The example uses the `bookDTD.xml` file as input. [!code-xml[XmlDocument.cctor#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDocument.cctor/XML/bookdtd.xml#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 联网的 XML 文档的聚合使用各种 W3C 标准包含机制的数据块组成，因此包含来自不同位置的节点。A networked XML document is comprised of chunks of data aggregated using various W3C standard inclusion mechanisms and therefore contains nodes that come from different places. `BaseURI`告诉您这些节点来自何处。The `BaseURI` tells you where these nodes came from. 对于文档节点，`BaseURI`返回 XML 文档的位置。For Document nodes, `BaseURI` returns the location of the XML document. 例如，如果`XmlDocument`使用以下调用加载`doc.Load("http://server/mydata.xml")`，则`BaseURI`文档节点是`http://server/mydata.xml`。For example, if the `XmlDocument` was loaded using the following call `doc.Load("http://server/mydata.xml")`, the `BaseURI` for the document node is `http://server/mydata.xml`. 但是，如果方法将重定向到另一个 URI，服务器`BaseURI`返回传递到的原始 URI`Load`方法。However, if the method is redirected by server to a different URI, `BaseURI` returns the original URI passed to the `Load` method. 此属性是文档对象模型 (DOM) 的 Microsoft 扩展。This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM). 有关其他信息`BaseURI`以及如何与其他节点类型，其行为方式，请参阅。For additional information on `BaseURI` and how it behaves with other node types, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面的 C# 代码The following C# code ```csharp XmlElement elem; elem=doc.CreateElement("xy", "item", "urn:abc"); ``` 创建的元素等效于以下 XML 文本：creates an element equivalent to the following XML text: ``` ``` 尽管此方法在文档的上下文中创建新的对象，但它不会自动添加新对象到文档树。Although this method creates the new object in the context of the document, it does not automatically add the new object to the document tree. 若要添加新对象，必须显式调用节点插入方法之一。To add the new object, you must explicitly call one of the node insert methods. 根据 W3C[可扩展标记语言 (XML) 1.0 建议](https://www.w3.org/TR/1998/REC-xml-19980210)，元素节点在文档和元素节点和 EntityReference 节点中时允许 EntityReference 是属性节点之外。According to the W3C [Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/1998/REC-xml-19980210), Element nodes are allowed within Document and Element nodes, and in EntityReference nodes when the EntityReference is outside an Attribute node. 此方法是 Microsoft 扩展到文档对象模型 (DOM)。This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM). ## Examples 下面的示例将新元素添加到现有的 XML 文档。The following example adds a new element to the existing XML document. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果被引用的实体已知的的子列表`XmlEntityReference`节点进行相应的相同节点。If the referenced entity is known, the child list of the `XmlEntityReference` node is made the same as that of the corresponding node. 在实体引用节点父级的第一次 （例如，当实体引用节点插入到文档） 的时间绑定实体引用的替换文本中使用的命名空间。The namespaces used in the replacement text for the entity reference are bound at the time the parent of the entity reference node is first set (for example, when the entity reference node is inserted into the document). 例如，给定以下实体：For example, given the following entity: ``` test"> ``` 如果调用`CreateEntityReference("a")`您得到的类型 EntityReference 单个节点不带任何子级。If you call `CreateEntityReference("a")` you get back a single node of type EntityReference with no children. 如果将该节点追加为以下节点的子级If you append this node as a child of the following node, ``` ``` 然后，在调用时、 设置新创建的实体引用节点的父级和子级在此命名空间上下文中扩展。then, at the time of calling , the parent of the newly created entity reference node is set and the children are expanded in this namespace context. 子元素节点`b`必须等于 NamespaceURI `urn:1`。The child element node `b` will have NamespaceURI equal to `urn:1`. 即使移动到具有不同的默认命名空间上下文的文档中的一个位置的实体引用的实体引用的子节点保持不变。The child nodes of the entity reference remain the same even if you move the entity reference to a place in the document that has a different default namespace context. 这不会针对现有实体引用节点时删除并将它们插入或实体引用克隆与。This does not happen for existing entity reference nodes when you remove and insert them or for entity references that you clone with . 它只发生在新创建的实体的引用。It only happens for newly created entity references. 如果相应的实体中未定义 DocumentType 添加的实体引用节点，因为未定义的实体引用，其唯一的子节点将是一个空文本节点。If the corresponding entity is not defined in the DocumentType when the entity reference node is added, because the entity reference is not defined, its only child node will be an empty text node. 此外允许内置实体 a m p、 lt、 gt、 2，和 q u o t，且必须具有相应的扩展的字符值子文本节点。The built-in entities amp, lt, gt, apos, and quot are also allowed, and they will have a child text node with the appropriate expanded character value. 尽管此方法在文档的上下文中创建新的对象，但它不会自动添加新对象到文档树。Although this method creates the new object in the context of the document, it does not automatically add the new object to the document tree. 若要添加新对象，必须显式调用节点插入方法之一。To add the new object, you must explicitly call one of the node insert methods. 根据 W3C[可扩展标记语言 (XML) 1.0 建议](https://www.w3.org/TR/1998/REC-xml-19980210)，元素、 属性和 EntityReference 节点内才允许使用 EntityReference 节点。According to the W3C [Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/1998/REC-xml-19980210), EntityReference nodes are only allowed within Element, Attribute and EntityReference nodes. ## Examples 以下示例创建两个实体引用节点，并将其插入到 XML 文档。The following example creates two entity reference nodes and inserts them into an XML document. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlDocument.CreateEntityReference Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDocument.CreateEntityReference Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlDocument.CreateEntityReference Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDocument.CreateEntityReference Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlDocument.CreateEntityReference Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDocument.CreateEntityReference Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

|------|--------------|------------------|--------------------|-------------|---------------|----------|-----------|------------|---------------------| |`Document`|否no|否no|否no|否no|否no|否no|否no|否no|否no| |`DocumentType`|是yes|否no|否no|否no|否no|否no|否no|否no|否no| |`XmlDeclaration`|是 \*yes\*|否no|否no|否no|否no|否no|否no|否no|否no| |`Element`|是yes|否no|否no|是yes|否no|否no|否no|否no|是 \* \* \*yes\*\*\*| |`Attribute`|否no|否no|否no|是 \* \* \*yes\*\*\*\*|否no|否no|否no|否no|否no| |`Text`|否no|否no|否no|是yes|是yes|否no|否no|否no|是yes| |`CDATA`|否no|否no|否no|是yes|否no|否no|否no|否no|是 \* \* \*yes\*\*\*| remarks.format:
## Remarks 返回的节点具有任何父级。The returned node has no parent. 源节点不更改或删除从原始文档;`ImportNode`创建源节点的副本。The source node is not altered or removed from the original document; `ImportNode` creates a copy of the source node. 导入节点将创建`XmlNode`所拥有的导入的文档中，使用对象和与源节点相同。Importing a node creates an `XmlNode` object owned by the importing document, with and identical to the source node. 新对象还具有与命名空间相关的属性 (， ，和)。The new object also has the attributes related to namespaces (, , and ). 具体取决于导入的节点和值的节点类型`deep`将复制适当的参数，其他信息。Depending on the node type of the imported node and the value of the `deep` parameter, additional information is copied as appropriate. 此方法尝试的镜像预期的行为，如果 XML 或 HTML 源的片段从一个文档复制到另一个 （认识到，在 XML 的情况下，两个文档可能具有不同 Dtd）。This method attempts to mirror the behavior expected if a fragment of XML or HTML source was copied from one document to another (recognizing that, in the XML case, the two documents could have different DTDs). 下表描述每个特定行为。The following table describes the specific behavior for each . |XmlNodeTypeXmlNodeType|ImportNode(true)ImportNode(true)|ImportNode(false)ImportNode(false)| |-----------------|------------------------|-------------------------| |特性Attribute|属性设置为`true`上生成。The property is set to `true` on the generated . 源的后代`XmlAttribute`以递归方式导入和生成的节点重新组合以构成相应的子树。The descendants of the source `XmlAttribute` are recursively imported and the resulting nodes reassembled to form the corresponding subtree.|`deep`参数不适用于`XmlAttribute`节点; 它们始终会包含导入时及其子级。The `deep` parameter does not apply to `XmlAttribute` nodes; they always carry their children with them when imported.| |CDataCData|复制该节点，包括复制其数据。Copies the node, including its data.|复制该节点，包括复制其数据。Copies the node, including its data.| |注释Comment|复制该节点，包括复制其数据。Copies the node, including its data.|复制该节点，包括复制其数据。Copies the node, including its data.| |DocumentFragmentDocumentFragment|递归导入源节点的子代，并重组生成的节点，以构成相应的子树。The descendants of the source node are recursively imported and the resulting nodes reassembled to form the corresponding subtree.|一个空生成。An empty is generated.| |DocumentTypeDocumentType|复制该节点，包括复制其数据。\*Copies the node, including its data.\*|复制该节点，包括复制其数据。\*Copies the node, including its data.\*| |元素Element|源元素及其指定的特性节点的后代是以递归方式导入和生成重组，以构成相应的子树的节点。The descendants of the source element and its specified attribute nodes are recursively imported and the resulting nodes reassembled to form the corresponding subtree.

注意:不复制默认属性。Note: Default attributes are not copied. 如果导入到的文档定义该元素名称的默认属性，则分配这些默认属性。If the document being imported into defines default attributes for this element name, those are assigned.|指定的属性导入源元素的节点，并将生成`XmlAttribute`节点附加到生成。Specified attribute nodes of the source element are imported, and the generated `XmlAttribute` nodes are attached to the generated .

注意:不复制默认属性。Note: Default attributes are not copied. 如果导入到的文档定义该元素名称的默认属性，则分配这些默认属性。If the document being imported into defines default attributes for this element name, those are assigned.| |EntityReferenceEntityReference|因为源和目标文档可能以不同的方式定义的实体，所以此方法仅复制节点。Because the source and destination documents could have the entities defined differently, this method only copies the node. 不包括替换文本。The replacement text is not included. 如果目标文档定义了实体，则给它赋值。If the destination document has the entity defined, its value is assigned.|因为源和目标文档可能以不同的方式定义的实体，所以此方法仅复制节点。Because the source and destination documents could have the entities defined differently, this method only copies the node. 不包括替换文本。The replacement text is not included. 如果目标文档定义了实体，则给它赋值。If the destination document has the entity defined, its value is assigned.| |ProcessingInstructionProcessingInstruction|从导入的节点复制目标和数据值。Copies the target and data value from the imported node.|从导入的节点复制目标和数据值。Copies the target and data value from the imported node.| |TextText|复制该节点，包括复制其数据。Copies the node, including its data.|复制该节点，包括复制其数据。Copies the node, including its data.| |SignificantWhitespaceSignificantWhitespace|复制该节点，包括复制其数据。Copies the node, including its data.|复制该节点，包括复制其数据。Copies the node, including its data.| |WhitespaceWhitespace|复制该节点，包括复制其数据。Copies the node, including its data.|复制该节点，包括复制其数据。Copies the node, including its data.| |XmlDeclarationXmlDeclaration|从导入的节点复制目标和数据值。Copies the target and data value from the imported node.|从导入的节点复制目标和数据值。Copies the target and data value from the imported node.| |所有其他节点类型。All other node types.|不能导入这些节点类型。These node types cannot be imported.|不能导入这些节点类型。These node types cannot be imported.| \* 尽管可以导入 DocumentType 节点，一个文档只能有一个 DocumentType。\*Although DocumentType nodes can be imported, a document can only have one DocumentType. 如果该文档当前具有 DocumenType 节点，必须添加一个新之前删除它。If the document currently has a DocumenType node, it must be removed before adding a new one. ## Examples 下面的示例从第二个 XML 文档导入到原始的 XML 文档的 book 节点。The following example imports a book node from a second XML document into the original XML document. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlDocument.ImportNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDocument.ImportNode Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlDocument.ImportNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDocument.ImportNode Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlDocument.ImportNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDocument.ImportNode Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 该示例使用该文件，`books.xml`作为输入。The example uses the file, `books.xml`, as input. [!code-xml[Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XslTransform.Transform7 Example/XML/books.xml#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性将给定字符串的已分析内容替换节点的子级。Setting this property replaces the children of the node with the parsed contents of the given string. 分析在当前命名空间上下文中完成。The parsing is done in the current namespace context. `InnerXml` 删除冗余的命名空间声明。`InnerXml` removes redundant namespace declarations. 因此，大量的剪切和粘贴操作并不会使文档的大小因多余的命名空间声明而增加。As a result, numerous cut and paste operations do not increase the size of your document with redundant namespace declarations. 请考虑以下 XSL 文档：Consider the following XSL document: ```xml ... ``` `InnerXml`样式表节点上的属性将返回以下字符串：The `InnerXml` property on the stylesheet node returns the following string: ```xml ... ``` 请注意其他 xmlns:xsl 命名空间声明用于保留节点标识。Notice the additional xmlns:xsl namespace declaration which is used to preserve the node identity. 如果重新插入此内部的 XML 字符串，将获取原始文档。If you re-insert this inner XML string, you will get back your original document. 换而言之，`InnerXml`识别出 xmlns:xsl 命名空间声明是冗余的假设父 xsl: stylesheet 元素已经具有 xmlns:xsl 命名空间声明，并将其删除。In other words, `InnerXml` recognizes that the xmlns:xsl namespace declaration is redundant, given that the parent xsl:stylesheet element already has the xmlns:xsl namespace declaration, and therefore removes it. 如果移动`InnerXml`从向文档在没有默认命名空间与默认命名空间文档的行为是稍有不同。If you move `InnerXml` from a document with no default namespace to a document with a default namespace, the behavior is a little different. 请考虑以下 XML 字符串：Consider the following XML string: ```xml 123 ``` `InnerXml` 返回纯 XML 字符串，其中没有命名空间声明：`InnerXml` returns a plain XML string with no namespace declarations: ```xml 123 ``` 如果您然后将此字符串插入到文档具有一个默认命名空间，如下所示：If you then insert this string into a document that does have a default namespace, such as the following: ```xml ``` `InnerXml` 分析选取 urn: 1 命名空间中的上下文中，并在新节点的字符串。`InnerXml` parses the string in context, and the new nodes pick up the urn:1 namespace. 结果如下所示：The result looks like this: ```xml 123 ``` 现在当要求提供`InnerXml`将返回如下：Now when you ask for the `InnerXml` you get back the following: ```xml 123 ``` 如果你明确想要记住这一点，它是来自于不具有命名空间，则需要手动添加 xmlns 的文档的插入的项 =""声明和插入结果字符串：If you explicitly want the inserted item to preserve the fact that it came from a document that had no namespace then you need to manually add an xmlns= "" declaration and insert the resulting string: ```xml 123 ``` 最终结果为所有这些操作，如下所示：The net effect of all this is as follows: 1. 剪切和粘贴`InnerXml`不使用的文档之间命名空间是干净、 简单和不会在您的字符串中创建"xmlns"冗余。Cutting and pasting `InnerXml` among documents that do not use namespaces is clean and simple and does not create "xmlns" redundancy in your strings. 2. `InnerXml` 此外可具有多个命名空间 （这是 XSL 样式表） 的文档之间进行剪切和粘贴。`InnerXml` can also be used to cut and paste between documents which have more than one namespace (that is XSL stylesheets). 3. xmlns:xsl 声明自动显示在您的字符串，并在节点层次结构中消失。xmlns:xsl declarations automatically appear in your strings and disappear in your node hierarchies. 4. 在移动的情况`InnerXml`到具有默认命名空间的文档没有默认命名空间的文档，从新的节点会选取新的默认命名空间。In the case where you are moving `InnerXml` from a document that has no default namespace to a document that does have a default namespace, the new nodes will pick up the new default namespace. 如果`InnerXml`设置与包含实体引用的文档中当前未定义的文本，生成的树将包含空的 EntityReference 节点。If `InnerXml` is set with text containing entity references that are not currently defined in the document, the resulting tree will contain empty EntityReference nodes. 此属性是文档对象模型 (DOM) 的 Microsoft 扩展。This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只读节点是一个不能更改其属性、 特性或子级。A read-only node is one whose properties, attributes, or children cannot be changed. 可以从树中删除只读节点并插入其他位置。You can remove a read-only node from the tree and insert it somewhere else. 此属性是文档对象模型 (DOM) 的 Microsoft 扩展。This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 `IsReadOnly` 属性。The following example shows how to use the `IsReadOnly` property. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > `Load`方法总是保留有效空白。The `Load` method always preserves significant white space. 属性确定是否保留无意义的空白区域，即元素内容中的空白区域。The property determines whether or not insignificant white space, that is white space in element content, is preserved. 默认值是`false`; 不保留元素内容中的空格。The default is `false`; white space in element content is not preserved. 如果您希望验证发生，则可以创建一个验证使用的实例类和方法。If you want validation to occur, you can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅 引用页的“备注”部分。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. 此方法是 Microsoft 扩展到文档对象模型 (DOM)。This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM). 此方法会自动检测输入 （例如，UTF-8、 ANSI，等） 的 XML 的字符串格式。This method automatically detects the string format of the input XML (for example, UTF-8, ANSI, and so on). 如果你的应用程序需要知道用于读取流的编码，请考虑使用对象来读取的流，然后使用属性来确定的编码。If your application needs to know which encoding is used to read the stream, consider using an object to read the stream, and then use the property to determine the encoding. 如果需要使用对象处理的 XML，可以使用对象创建一个。If you need to use a object to work with XML, you can use the object to create one. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XPathDocument 和 XmlDocument 读取 XML 数据](~/docs/standard/data/xml/reading-xml-data-using-xpathdocument-and-xmldocument.md)。For more information, see [Reading XML Data using XPathDocument and XmlDocument](~/docs/standard/data/xml/reading-xml-data-using-xpathdocument-and-xmldocument.md).

不保留元素内容中的空格。The default is `false`; white space in element content is not preserved. 如果读取器处于初始状态 ( = ReadState.Initial)，`Load`使用读取器的全部内容，并生成它找到从 DOM。If the reader is in the initial state ( =ReadState.Initial), `Load` consumes the entire contents of the reader and builds the DOM from what it finds. 如果读取器已位于在深度"n"的某个节点上，此方法将加载该节点和所有后续同级节点，直到关闭深度"n"的结束标记。If the reader is already positioned on some node at depth "n", this method loads that node and all subsequent siblings up to the end tag that closes depth "n". 这会产生下列结果。This has the following results. 如果当前节点和其同级看起来如下所示：If the current node and its siblings look like the following: ```xml onetwo ``` `Load` 引发异常，因为文档不能包含两个根级别元素。`Load` throws an exception because a document cannot have two root level elements. 如果当前节点和其同级看起来如下所示：If the current node and its siblings look like the following: ```xml ``` `Load` 成功，但你有一个不完整的 DOM 树，因为不存在根级别元素。`Load` succeeds, but you have an incomplete DOM tree because there is no root level element. 保存文档之前，您必须添加根级别元素，否则将引发异常。Before you save the document, you must add a root level element, otherwise will throw an exception. 如果读取器定位于对于文档，例如空格或属性节点的根级别来说无效的叶节点则读取器继续读取，直到它定位在可用于根节点上。If the reader is positioned on a leaf node that is invalid for the root level of a document, for example a white space or attribute node, the reader continues to read until it is positioned on a node that can be used for the root. 文档在此时开始加载。The document begins loading at this point. 如果您希望验证发生，则可以创建一个验证使用的实例类和方法。If you want validation to occur, you can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅 引用页的“备注”部分。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. 此方法是 Microsoft 扩展到文档对象模型 (DOM)。This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM). ## Examples 下面的示例加载的最后一个 book 节点`books.xml`到 XML 文档中的文件。The following example loads the last book node of the `books.xml` file into the XML document. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlDocument.Load2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDocument.Load2 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlDocument.Load2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDocument.Load2 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlDocument.Load2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDocument.Load2 Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 该示例使用该文件，`books.xml`作为输入。The example uses the file, `books.xml`, as input. span.span: An enabling you to get the atomized version of a string within the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个`XmlDocument`对象具有对象。Each `XmlDocument` object has a object. 元素和属性名称存储在`NameTable`作为原子化字符串。Element and attribute names are stored in the `NameTable` as atomized strings. 这意味着，即使名称引用文档中多次存储一次只能在`NameTable`。This means that even if a name is referenced in the document multiple times it is stored only once in the `NameTable`. 例如，如果文档具有多个元素具有名称"客户"`NameTable`每当它收到对该名称的请求时返回相同的对象。For example, if the document had multiple elements with the name "Customer", `NameTable` returns the same object whenever it receives a request for that name. 因此，用户可以编写代码使用对象比较这些字符串而不是开销更大的字符串比较。As a result, users can write code using object comparisons on these strings rather than the more expensive string comparisons. 有关原子化字符串的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on atomized strings, see . 此方法是 Microsoft 扩展到文档对象模型 (DOM)。This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定在加载过程中如何处理空白区域，并保存过程。This property determines how white space is handled during the load and save process. 如果`PreserveWhitespace`是`true`之前或是调用，空白节点会保留; 否则为如果此属性为`false`、 保留有效空白、 空白区域不是。If `PreserveWhitespace` is `true` before or is called, white space nodes are preserved; otherwise, if this property is `false`, significant white space is preserved, white space is not. 如果`PreserveWhitespace`是`true`之前是调用，在文档中的空白是保留在输出中; 否则为如果此属性为`false`，`XmlDocument`自动缩进输出。If `PreserveWhitespace` is `true` before is called, white space in the document is preserved in the output; otherwise, if this property is `false`, `XmlDocument` auto-indents the output. 此方法是 Microsoft 扩展到文档对象模型 (DOM)。This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何删除一个文件中的空白区域。The following example shows how to strip white space from a file. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法验证中的 XML 数据中包含的架构对属性。The method validates the XML data in the against the schemas contained in the property. 方法执行信息集增加。The method performs infoset augmentation. 具体而言，成功验证之后，应用的架构默认值、 文本值转换为所需的原子值和类型信息与经过验证的信息项关联。Specifically, after successful validation, schema defaults are applied, text values are converted to atomic values as necessary, and type information is associated with validated information items. 结果是一个以前非类型化的 XML 子树中替换为类型化的子树。The result is a previously un-typed XML sub-tree in the replaced with a typed sub-tree. 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 架构位置提示喜欢`xsi:schemaLocation`或`xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation`将被忽略。Schema location hints like `xsi:schemaLocation` or `xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation` are ignored. - 将忽略内联架构。Inline schemas are ignored. - 如果在验证期间出现架构验证错误变得部分使用正确的类型信息与某些节点和一些而无需验证。If schema validation errors occur during validation the becomes partially validated with some nodes with correct type information and some without. - 验证过程包括检查唯一性和引用约束 (`xs:ID`， `xs:IDREF`， `xs:key`， `xs:keyref`，和`xs:unique`)。The validation process includes checking for uniqueness and reference constraints (`xs:ID`, `xs:IDREF`, `xs:key`, `xs:keyref`, and `xs:unique`). ## Examples 下面的示例阐释了 方法的用法。The following example illustrates use of the method. 此示例将创建，其中包含关联的 XSD 架构使用和对象。The example creates an that contains an associated XSD schema using the and objects. 该示例然后使用类，以正确地修改生成的架构验证错误的 XML 文档中的元素的类型化的值。The example then uses the class to incorrectly modify the typed value of an element in the XML document generating a schema validation error. [!code-cpp[XPathValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathValidation/CPP/XPathValidation.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XPathValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathValidation/CS/XPathValidation.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XPathValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathValidation/VB/XPathValidation.vb#1)] 该示例使用`contosoBooks.xml`和`contosoBooks.xsd`文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` and `contosoBooks.xsd` files as input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xml#2)] [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xsd#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法验证中的 XML 数据对象中包含的架构与属性。The method validates the XML data in the object against the schemas contained in the property. 方法执行信息集增加。The method performs infoset augmentation. 具体而言，成功验证之后，应用的架构默认值、 文本值转换为所需的原子值和类型信息与经过验证的信息项关联。Specifically, after successful validation, schema defaults are applied, text values are converted to atomic values as necessary, and type information is associated with validated information items. 结果是一个以前非类型化的 XML 子树中替换为类型化的子树。The result is a previously un-typed XML sub-tree in the replaced with a typed sub-tree. 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 架构位置提示喜欢`xsi:schemaLocation`或`xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation`将被忽略。Schema location hints like `xsi:schemaLocation` or `xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation` are ignored. - 将忽略内联架构。Inline schemas are ignored. - 如果在验证期间出现架构验证错误变得部分使用正确的类型信息与某些节点和一些而无需验证。If schema validation errors occur during validation the becomes partially validated with some nodes with correct type information and some without. 如果要验证的节点为根节点，则验证过程包括检查唯一性和引用约束 (`xs:ID`， `xs:IDREF`， `xs:key`， `xs:keyref`，和`xs:unique`); 否则为唯一性和引用将忽略约束。If the node to validate is the root node, the validation process includes checking for uniqueness and reference constraints (`xs:ID`, `xs:IDREF`, `xs:key`, `xs:keyref`, and `xs:unique`); otherwise, uniqueness and reference constraints are omitted. ## Examples 有关的示例方法，请参阅方法。For an example of the method, see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `XmlResolver`可用于加载 Dtd 或扩展实体引用。The `XmlResolver` can be used to load DTDs or expand entity references. 使用属性，您可以对设置凭据`XmlResolver`访问存储在安全的网络资源上的资源。Using the property, you can set credentials on the `XmlResolver` to access resources stored on a secure network resource. - 如果不使用加载该文档（即，已加载使用一个流，文件中，依次类推）`XmlResolver`上`XmlDocument`始终使用。If the document was not loaded using an (that is, if it was loaded using a stream, file, and so on) the `XmlResolver` on the `XmlDocument` is always used. - 如果使用已加载该文档，在冲突解决程序`XmlTextReader`用于解析 DocumentType 节点中的任何 DTD 引用。If the document was loaded with an , the resolver on the `XmlTextReader` is used to resolve any DTD references in the DocumentType node. 冲突解决程序`XmlDocument`用于展开任何实体引用。The resolver on the `XmlDocument` is used to expand any entity references. - 如果使用已加载该文档，在冲突解决程序`XmlDocument`从未使用过。If the document was loaded with an , the resolver on the `XmlDocument` is never used. - 如果文档加载时使用的类来扩展`XmlReader`并`XmlReader`不能解析实体 (返回`false`)，则`XmlResolver`上`XmlDocument`用于解析 DocumentType 节点中的任何引用并展开任何实体引用。If the document was loaded with a class that extends `XmlReader` and the `XmlReader` cannot resolve entities ( returns `false`), the `XmlResolver` on the `XmlDocument` is used to resolve any references in the DocumentType node and to expand any entity references. > [!NOTE] > 如果`XmlDocument`使用加载这些曾经`XmlResolver`设置为，`XmlResolver`上`XmlReader`不缓存`XmlDocument`后完成。If the `XmlDocument` is loaded using an which had an `XmlResolver` set to it, the `XmlResolver` on the `XmlReader` is not cached by the `XmlDocument` after completes. 在.net Framework 1.1 版中，如果未设置此属性，该应用程序的信任级别确定的默认行为。In version 1.1 of the.NET Framework, if this property is not set, the trust level of the application determines the default behavior. `Fully trusted code:` 文档是否使用默认值使用没有用户凭据。`Fully trusted code:` The document uses a default with no user credentials. 如果访问网络资源需要身份验证，使用`XmlResolver`属性来指定`XmlResolver`与所需的凭据。If authentication is required to access a network resource, use the `XmlResolver` property to specify an `XmlResolver` with the necessary credentials. `Semi-trusted code:` `XmlResolver`属性设置为`null`。`Semi-trusted code:` The `XmlResolver` property is set to `null`. 不解析外部资源。External resources are not resolved. 有关安全性的详细信息和`XmlResolver`属性，请参阅[解析外部资源](~/docs/standard/data/xml/resolving-external-resources.md)。For more information on security and the `XmlResolver` property, see [Resolving External Resources](~/docs/standard/data/xml/resolving-external-resources.md). 此属性是文档对象模型 (DOM) 的 Microsoft 扩展。This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM). ## Examples 下面的示例加载的 XML 文档，其中包括对 DTD 文件的引用。The following example loads an XML document which includes a reference to a DTD file. `XmlResolver`属性用于设置访问网络资源所需的凭据。The `XmlResolver` property is used to set the credentials necessary to access the network resource. [!code-cpp[XmlDocument.XmlResolver#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDocument.XmlResolver/CPP/docresolver.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlDocument.XmlResolver#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDocument.XmlResolver/CS/docresolver.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlDocument.XmlResolver#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDocument.XmlResolver/VB/docresolver.vb#1)] 该示例使用以下数据文件作为输入。The example uses the following data files as input. `book5.xml` [!code-xml[XmlDocument.XmlResolver#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDocument.XmlResolver/XML/book5.xml#2)] `books.dtd` [!code-xml[XmlDocument.XmlResolver#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDocument.XmlResolver/XML/books.dtd#3)]
